org.ibmstreams.bigsql.transform

Class ToBIGSQL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ibmstreams.bigsql.transform.ToBIGSQL

  • public class ToBIGSQL
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    sbartkowski

    Provides transformation of Java type to appropriate byte[] binary sequence. Helper class, contains only static methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      DOUBLE value transformation to binary
